id: scenario-value-scanner-senior-scenarios-community-coordinating community resource sharing and mutual aid
title: Coordinating community resource sharing and mutual aid
description: Coordinating community resource sharing and mutual aid
content:
Scenario: Coordinating community resource sharing and mutual aid
    Given Margaret has organizational skills and available time
    And community needs coordination of sharing networks
    When the community_elohim facilitates resource coordination
    Then Margaret should be identified as potential coordinator
    And her labor in coordinating should be recognized and valued
    And community resource sharing should reduce individual scarcity
    And Margaret's organizational contributions should strengthen community
    And her time availability should serve collective benefit
    And coordination labor should be visible and appreciated
